p: NGAL was determined using the canine NGAL Elisa kit (Abcam, USA) and the results are expressed as NGAL/creatinine ratio (uNGAL/CR). Cystatin C was measured using a turbidimetric latex assay (Spinreact, Spain) and is expressed as CysC/creatinine ratio (uCysC/CR). Mann‐Whitney‐ U test was used to run all comparisons due to the non‐gaussian distribution of the data with P < 0.05 considered as statistically significant.
